channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Why Ukraine has not held an election since Russia’s invasion
What the dramatic US seizure of Venezuela-linked oil tanker tells us
History Today: How Delhi became the power capital of India
FirstUp: Putin likely to attend peace forum, Italy's PM to meet Palestine’s Abbas... The news today
Why a Spanish woman was fired for regularly showing up 40 minutes early to work
Is Trump planning an oil blockade of Venezuela to bring Maduro down?
Tanzania’s 2025 elections: When patronage politics meets popular revolt
item.description: This year’s elections in Tanzania have pushed the country into its most volatile political crisis in decades, exposing the limits of patronage politics amid a fierce youth-led uprising

item.title: Dhaka’s dangerous drift: How Yunus’s power play has empowered Islamists and external actors
item.description: Today, Bangladesh stands at a crossroads, marred by internal turbulence and major powers rivalry, with the future rather unpredictable.

item.title: A nation in turmoil: Why Imran Khan still terrifies Pakistan Army
item.description: The ongoing battle in Pakistan is not between Imran Khan and Shehbaz Sharif, who is a puppet of the Army. It is between Imran Khan and the coterie of generals led by Field Marshal Asim Munir.

item.title: How Modi and Putin re-energised India-Russia multilateral cooperation
item.description: The nature and scope of cooperation in various multilateral institutions, which often finds Russia and India pursuing the same causes and goals, are wide-ranging.

item.title: How lessons from 1971 war can shape India’s whole-of-nation security doctrine
item.description: The lessons of the India-Pakistan war of 1971 should guide India’s collective approach to national security, uniting government, military and society to address the security challenges of today and tomorrow

item.title: A hemisphere-first strategy: Ten ways America has redrawn its global role in the new NSS
item.description: The new National Security Strategy seeks to reshape America’s position within the global order, compressing global obligations while expanding the instruments of coercive economic statecraft.
